joelib2.util
Class BasicArrayHelper

java.lang.Object
  joelib2.util.BasicArrayHelper
All Implemented Interfaces:
ArrayHelper
public class BasicArrayHelper
extends Object
implements ArrayHelper

Array helper methods for writing and loading arrays.

  • Jörg Kurt Wegner.

Method Detail

booleanArrayFromSimpleString

public static boolean[] booleanArrayFromSimpleString(String sArrays,
                                                     String separator)
Loads boolean array from String . Format i_1,i_2,...,i_n. ',' is here the default separator. It's slower than using booleanArrayFromString.

Parameters:
separator - Description of the Parameter
sArrays - Description of the Parameter
size - Description of the Parameter
Returns:
Description of the Return Value

booleanArrayFromString

public static List booleanArrayFromString(String sArrays,
                                          String separator,
                                          int size)
Loads boolean array from String . Format n. ',' is here the default separator. It's faster to use this method than using booleanArrayFromSimpleString.

Parameters:
separator - Description of the Parameter
sArrays - Description of the Parameter
size - Description of the Parameter

Description of the Return Value
